languages.text: [Казнить еретиков] "Проявлять жалость к врагам Человечества — ересь. Приговор — смерть".
[Execute the heretics] "Showing mercy to enemies of Humanity would be heresy. I sentence them to death."
languages.original_text: [Казнить еретиков] "Проявлять жалость к врагам Человечества — ересь. Приговор — смерть".

traits.locale_text: [Execute the heretics] "Showing mercy to enemies of Humanity would be heresy. I sentence them to death."

languages.text: [处决所有异端分子]“对人类之敌仁慈是异端恶行，我要判处所有人死刑。”
languages.original_text: [Execute the heretics] "Showing mercy to enemies of Humanity would be heresy. I sentence them to death."

traits.locale_text: [处决所有异端分子]“对人类之敌仁慈是异端恶行，我要判处所有人死刑。”

languages.text: [Die Ketzer hinrichten] "Feinden der Menschheit Gnade zu zeigen, wäre Ketzerei. Ich verurteile sie zum Tode."
languages.original_text: [Execute the heretics] "Showing mercy to enemies of Humanity would be heresy. I sentence them to death."

traits.locale_text: [Die Ketzer hinrichten] "Feinden der Menschheit Gnade zu zeigen, wäre Ketzerei. Ich verurteile sie zum Tode."

languages.text: [Ejecutar a los herejes] «Mostrar clemencia con los enemigos de la Humanidad sería una herejía. Los sentencio a muerte».
languages.original_text: [Execute the heretics] "Showing mercy to enemies of Humanity would be heresy. I sentence them to death."

traits.locale_text: [Ejecutar a los herejes] «Mostrar clemencia con los enemigos de la Humanidad sería una herejía. Los sentencio a muerte».

languages.text: [Exécuter les hérétiques] « Faire preuve de clémence envers les ennemis de l'humanité serait pure hérésie. Je les condamne à mort. »
languages.original_text: [Execute the heretics] "Showing mercy to enemies of Humanity would be heresy. I sentence them to death."

traits.locale_text: [Exécuter les hérétiques] « Faire preuve de clémence envers les ennemis de l'humanité serait pure hérésie. Je les condamne à mort. »

languages.text: [異端者を処刑する]「人類の敵に慈悲を示すことは異端の行いだ。私は彼らに死刑を宣告する」
languages.original_text: [Execute the heretics] "Showing mercy to enemies of Humanity would be heresy. I sentence them to death."

traits.locale_text: [異端者を処刑する]「人類の敵に慈悲を示すことは異端の行いだ。私は彼らに死刑を宣告する」

languages.text: [Kâfirleri idam et] "İnsanlığın düşmanlarına merhamet etmek, kâfirlikten başka bir şey değil. Sizi idama mahkûm ediyorum."
languages.original_text: [Execute the heretics] "Showing mercy to enemies of Humanity would be heresy. I sentence them to death."
